Games The latest on MultiVersus, KOF 15, Fatal Fury, and more Evo 2024 brings the best fighting game players to Las Vegas this weekend for a three-day tournament. This year‚Äôs Evo is the biggest in the event‚Äôs history, with more than 10,000 unique competitors facing off in games like Street Fighter 6, Tekken 8, Guilty Gear Strive, and Mortal Kombat 1. On top of being the fighting game tournament, Evo has also become a major news event. Publishers and devel...

entry.content: Image: Fingersoft, Lego A Lego remake of a classic racing game I played three video games in college: Halo 3 with my friends, Tom Clancy‚Äôs Ghost Recon Advanced Warfighter with my roommate and her dad, and Trials HD by myself. I have since opened my horizons to the possibilities of other video games. And when I want to feel nostalgic, there are plenty of games that give me the feeling of playing the multiplayer shooters of my youth ‚Äî but nothing but Trials itself has ever compared. entry.content: Sephiroth looks different here Before the era of consumer-driven game-making software like the Unreal Engine editor in Fortnite and Roblox, fans had a different way to flex their creative muscles: Little Big Planet. Now, more than 10 years after the release of Little Big Planet 2, one creator has remade the entirety of the original Final Fantasy 7 in meticulous detail within the game. The impressive undertaking reimagines and recreates the original Final Fantasy 7 section by section. Creator Jam...

entry.title: The magic of tabletop crowdfunding is dying | Polygon - Gaming
entry.summary: Burning money used to be more fun Compared to many other crowdfunding sectors, the board game business has been a relatively safe bet over the past decade. In stark contrast to what‚Äôs happened with t...
entry.content: Burning money used to be more fun Compared to many other crowdfunding sectors, the board game business has been a relatively safe bet over the past decade. In stark contrast to what‚Äôs happened with tech and video game backers, tabletop players have often plunked down their cash and then, a couple of years later, received crisp new boxes of cardboard and plastic. This approach has resulted in some of the best board games of the past decade, and it has fundamentally improved the industry by raisi...

entry.content: One counter to LLMs making up bogus sources or coming up with inaccuracies is retrieval-augmented generation or RAG. Not only can RAG decrease the tendency of LLMs to hallucinate but several other advantages as well.

entry.summary: Many modern mathematical proofs are a combination of conceptual arguments and technical calculations. There is something of a tradeoff between the two: one can add more conceptual arguments to try to ...
entry.content: Many modern mathematical proofs are a combination of conceptual arguments and technical calculations. There is something of a tradeoff between the two: one can add more conceptual arguments to try to reduce the technical computations, or vice versa. (Among other things, this leads to a Berkson paradox-like phenomenon in which a negative correlation can be [‚Ä¶]
